org.redpin.android.ui.mapview
Class MapView

java.lang.Object
  FrameLayout
      org.redpin.android.ui.mapview.MapView
All Implemented Interfaces:
DownloadImageTask.DownloadImageTaskCallback, ZoomAndScrollImageView.ZoomAndScrollViewListener
public class MapView
extends FrameLayout
implements DownloadImageTask.DownloadImageTaskCallback, ZoomAndScrollImageView.ZoomAndScrollViewListener

MapView displays a Map on the screen and its Location s depending on the selection of the user.

Author:
Pascal Brogle (broglep@student.ethz.ch)
